meanings.sent1: The ocean waves were spumiest during the storm.
meanings.sent2: The cappuccino was spumiest at the new cafe.
meanings.sent3: The spumiest bubble bath made the kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement bubbled over, making her the spumiest person in the room.
meanings.sent5: The spumiest clouds looked like whipped cream in the sky.

meanings.definition: Having the most foam or froth
meanings.sent1: The spumiest milkshake was a hit at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The spumiest latte was served at the fancy coffee shop.
meanings.sent3: The spumiest dog in the park loved to play in the fountain.
meanings.sent4: His spumiest ideas always brought a fresh perspective to the team.
meanings.sent5: The spumiest waterfall cascaded down the rocks, creating a mesmerizing sight.
